sn22.133:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṃ … pe …
sn22.133:4.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṃ mahākoṭṭhikaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.133:5.1: “Idhāvuso, assutavā puthujjano rūpassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
sn22.133:5.5: viññāṇassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
sn22.133:6.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṃ mahākoṭṭhikaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.133:7.1: “Idhāvuso, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
sn22.133:7.5: viññāṇassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
